pkgmetadata.longdescription: # get_certTool for downloading ssl certificates from remote servers.## InstallationJust use PIP:```bashpip install get_cert```## Usage```bash$ python -m get_cert --helpUsage: get_cert.py [OPTIONS] URL Retrieve and print out the ssl certificate. Args: URL (str): url to be picked upOptions: --help Show this message and exit.```
